mapper.select: SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , b.mem_id , b.mem_nm , TO_CHAR(a.update_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as update_dt FROM boards a, members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.use_yn ='Y' ORDER BY a.update_dt DESC

SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , a.board_content , b.mem_id , b.mem_nm , TO_CHAR(a.update_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as update_dt FROM boards a, members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.use_yn ='Y' AND a.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(board_title, board_content, mem_id) VALUES(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{memId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.reply_no , a.board_no , b.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.reply_content , TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as reply_date FROM replys a, members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY reply_date DESC

SELECT a.reply_no , a.board_no , b.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.reply_content , TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as reply_date FROM replys a, members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replys (reply_no, board_no, mem_id , reply_content) VALUES (#{replyNo}, #{boardNo}, #{memId}, #{replyContent})
